column1: Girithron is the Sindarin name for the twelfth month of the year
column3: according to the calendars of the Dunedain. Girithron in the Kings Reckoning and Stewards Reckoning corresponded to Foreyule in the Shire Calendar (approximately modern 21 November through 20 December).

column1: The name apparently contains girith "shivering" and raun "moon
